com.here.sdk.mapviewlite

Class MapCircle

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.NativeBase
      • com.here.sdk.mapviewlite.MapCircle

  • public final class MapCircle
extends NativeBase

    A visual representation of a MapCircle with attached styling, which can be placed on the MapScene to be drawn.

    Note: The circle's center latitude must be limited to the range of [85S, 85N], otherwise no circle will be drawn. The radius should not exceed [89S, 89N] to prevent crossing a pole, otherwise it will be clamped to the nearest value.
